mapper.select: select * from ( select * from schedule where (game_date between to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') and to_char(sysdate+6,'yyyy-mm-dd')) UNION select * from schedule where game_date = to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-MM-dd') and sysdate between to_date('00:00', 'HH24:Mi') and to_date(game_time, 'HH24:Mi')+3/48 ) s inner join team t on(s.rival = t.sponsor) order by game_date asc
